caption__00001:
Certainly! In season 1 episode_2 of Friends, titled "The One With the Lack Factor," Ross and Rachel are at Central Perk when they start talking about their dreams. Specifically, they discuss a recurring theme in both of their dreams - being naked in front of other people.
Ross explains that he often has this dream where he's walking down the street completely starkers, feeling embarrassed but also strangely liberated. Meanwhile, Rachel reveals she frequently experiences similar nightmares except hers involve her ex-fiancé Barry instead of just random bystanders. As expected from these two friends who love to share personal stories with each another (and sometimes make fun), jokes ensue as Monica teases them for having such weird sleep patterns while Joey chimes in saying his own wildest fantasies don’t compare – though maybe Chandler could help him out there?

subtitle__00017: You have to give them something.That was Gerston, Santos, and who's the other guy?-Petrie. -Petrie. Right, okay.Well, some people are gonna be working......this weekend.Oh, that's nice.Ross.I'm here.You are?We were just....What?
caption__00018:
Љ Friends 2x18 "The One Where No one's In"
In this episode, the friends are in a new setting: they all have to stay at Monica and Rachel’s place because there is no power or water outside. They start telling stories of their childhood memories when it was raining heavily; Joey tells about his mom making him wear ridiculous outfits as an infant for photo shoots while Chandler recounts how he used to be afraid that if lightning struck something near where he hid during thunderstorms would get electrified too! Meanwhile, Phoebe tries unsuccessfully to teach her pet monkey some tricks before deciding instead on teaching herself yoga poses from inside due to lacking anything else better do so...
